results.title: Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension
results.text_hl: Many landmark trials have shown the benefit of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ protection against @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@.

results.title: Effect of Amlodipine in Stroke and Myocardial infarction: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysis
results.text_hl: a Forest plot of risk ratio (RR) of @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ vs. other drugs), b Forest plot of RR of @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ vs. placebo)

results.title: Calcium channel blockers, survival and ischaemic stroke in patients with dementia: a Swedish registry study
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ was associated with lower @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ risk in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's dementia@@@ compared to other CCBs (aHR 0.63; CI, 0.44-0.89; P < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Kalar I, Xu H, Secnik J, Schwertner E, Kramberger MG, Winblad B, von Euler M, Eriksdotter M, Garcia-Ptacek S. Calcium channel blockers, survival and ischaemic stroke in patients with dementia: a Swedish registry study J Intern Med. 2021 Apr;289(4):508-522. PMID: 32854138

results.title: A possible increase in liver enzymes due to amlodipine: A case report
results.text_hl: Here, we present a 47-year-old male @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ known to be @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ and admitted to our rehabilitation facility after an @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@acute stroke@@@. During his stay, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ was started in addition to other antihypertensive medications to control his blood pressure.

citations.NLM: Varghese G, Madi L, Ghannam M, Saad R. A possible increase in liver enzymes due to amlodipine: A case report SAGE Open Med Case Rep. 2020;8():2050313X20917822. PMID: 32637107
citations.BibTeX: @article{32637107, title={A possible increase in liver enzymes due to amlodipine: A case report}, author={Varghese G and Madi L and Ghannam M and Saad R}, journal={SAGE Open Med Case Rep}, volume={8}, pages={2050313X20917822}}

results.title: Long-Term Incidence of Stroke and Dementia in ASCOT
results.text_hl: In conclusion, we demonstrate the importance of BP control with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ rather than @CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ prevention and that starting @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ about 5 years earlier still has an important detectable effect on @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ incidence over 20 years.

citations.NLM: Whiteley WN, Gupta AK, Godec T, Rostamian S, Whitehouse A, Mackay J, Sever PS. Long-Term Incidence of Stroke and Dementia in ASCOT Stroke. 2021 Oct;52(10):3088-3096. PMID: 34192893
citations.BibTeX: @article{34192893, title={Long-Term Incidence of Stroke and Dementia in ASCOT}, author={Whiteley WN and Gupta AK and Godec T and Rostamian S and Whitehouse A and Mackay J and Sever PS}, journal={Stroke}, volume={52}, number={10}, pages={3088-3096}}

results.title: Efficacy of methylene blue in a murine model of amlodipine overdose.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Only 50% of control animals survived to the two-hour endpoint compared to 83% that received @CHEMICAL_Methylene_Blue @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008751 @@@methylene blue@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ delivery induced significant reduction in left ventricular ejection fraction (EF), fractional shortening (FS), @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ volume (SV), and cardiac output (CO) in the vehicle treated animals relative to animals in the treatment group (p < 0.05 vehicle versus @CHEMICAL_Methylene_Blue @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008751 @@@Methylene blue@@@ for EF, FS, SV, CO, and HR).

citations.NLM: de Castro Brás LE, Baccanale CL, Eccleston L, Sloan T, St Antoine JC, Verzwyvelt SM, Pittman P, O'Rourke D, Meggs WJ. Efficacy of methylene blue in a murine model of amlodipine overdose. Am J Emerg Med. 2021 Jul;45():284-289. PMID: 33041135
citations.BibTeX: @article{33041135, title={Efficacy of methylene blue in a murine model of amlodipine overdose.}, author={de Castro Brás LE and Baccanale CL and Eccleston L and Sloan T and St Antoine JC and Verzwyvelt SM and Pittman P and O'Rourke D and Meggs WJ}, journal={Am J Emerg Med}, volume={45}, pages={284-289}}

results.title: Fixed-dose combination of amlodipine and atorvastatin improves clinical outcomes in patients with concomitant hypertension and dyslipidemia.
results.text_hl: Fixed-dose combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ improves clinical outcomes in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with concomitant @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@.

results.title: Choice of antihypertensive agent in isolated systolic hypertension and isolated diastolic hypertension: A secondary analysis of the ALLHAT trial.
results.text_hl: We compared the use of @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on the primary outcome of combined @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, or all-cause mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with isolated @DISEASE_Isolated_Systolic_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000092244 @@@systolic hypertension@@@ or isolated @DISEASE_Hypertension_Diastolic_Resistance_to @DISEASE_MESH:C563897 @@@diastolic hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang SY, Hanna JM, Gongal P, Onuma OK, Nanna MG. Choice of antihypertensive agent in isolated systolic hypertension and isolated diastolic hypertension: A secondary analysis of the ALLHAT trial. Am Heart J. 2022 Dec;254():30-34. PMID: 35932912

results.title: Blood Pressure-Lowering Profiles and Clinical Effects of Angiotensin Receptor Blockers Versus Calcium Channel Blockers.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, the higher risks of @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ randomized to @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ were related to the drugs' different blood pressure modulating profiles.

citations.NLM: Mehlum MH, Liestøl K, Kjeldsen SE, Wyller TB, Julius S, Rothwell PM, Mancia G, Parati G, Weber MA, Berge E. Blood Pressure-Lowering Profiles and Clinical Effects of Angiotensin Receptor Blockers Versus Calcium Channel Blockers. Hypertension. 2020 Jun;75(6):1584-1592. PMID: 32336236

results.title: Triple Therapy Prevention of Recurrent Intracerebral Disease Events Trial: Rationale, design and progress.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: The Triple Therapy Prevention of Recurrent @DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@Intracerebral Disease@@@ Events Trial (TRIDENT) aims to determine the effects of a novel SPC "Triple Pill," three generic antihypertensive drugs with demonstrated efficacy and complementary mechanisms of action at half standard dose (@CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ 20 mg, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 2.5 mg, and @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@ 1.25 mg), with placebo for the prevention of recurrent @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, cardiovascular events, and @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ after @DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@.

citations.NLM: Anderson CS, Rodgers A, de Silva HA, Martins SO, Klijn CJ, Senanayake B, Freed R, Billot L, Arima H, Thang NH, Zaidi WAW, Kherkheulidze T, Wahab K, Fisher U, Lee TH, Chen C, Pontes-Neto O, Robinson T, Wang J, Naismith S, Song L, Schreuder FH, Lindley RI, Woodward M, MacMahon S, Salman RA, Chow CK, Chalmers J. Triple Therapy Prevention of Recurrent Intracerebral Disease Events Trial: Rationale, design and progress. Int J Stroke. 2022 Dec;17(10):1156-1162. PMID: 34994269
